description.narrative: This activity (Market Development Programme - Implementation Phase) is a component of Samarth- Nepal Market Development Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £15,756,650. This component benefits Nepal, and works in the following sector(s): Agricultural policy and administrative management, Agricultural development, Livestock, Agricultural services, Tourism policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International. The start date is 28-11-2012 and the end date is 30-04-2019.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
